description: '''The Duke of Iron''' (born '''Cecil Anderson''', 22 November 1906 â€“ 17 November 1968) was a [[calypsonian]], [[nightclub]] and concert entertainer, and recording artist from the 1930s through the 1960s.  Born in [[Trinidad]] and working mainly in the United States, he was renowned for his [[Ribaldry|bawdy]] humor, crisp [[diction]], and confident vocal mannerisms. His clarity in pronouncing English lyrics helped him achieve tremendous popularity with American audiences.
